message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to pay closer to $9,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thank you for your response, Bob. After considering your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. I would like to propose a price of $9,200 for the product. Please let me know if this works for you.
